table_description: GitHub Repositories contain all of your project's files and each file's revision history.

columns.name: GitHubRepoID
columns.description: Unique identifier of the GitHub repository.

columns.name: node_id
columns.description: Node ID of the repository.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the repository.

columns.name: name_with_owner
columns.description: Full name of the repository including the owner.

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of the repository.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the repository was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the repository was last updated.

columns.name: pushed_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the repository was last pushed.

columns.name: is_active
columns.description: Indicates if the repository is active.

columns.name: is_empty
columns.description: Indicates if the repository is empty.

columns.name: is_fork
columns.description: Indicates if the repository is a fork.

columns.name: is_security_policy_enabled
columns.description: Indicates if the repository has a security policy enabled.

columns.name: owner
columns.description: Owner details of the repository.

columns.name: homepage_url
columns.description: Homepage URL of the repository.

columns.name: license_info
columns.description: License information of the repository.

columns.name: topics
columns.description: List of topics associated with the repository.

columns.name: visibility
columns.description: Visibility status of the repository.

columns.name: default_branch_ref
columns.description: Details of the default branch of the repository.

columns.name: permissions
columns.description: Permissions associated with the repository.

columns.name: organization
columns.description: Organization details of the repository.

columns.name: parent
columns.description: Parent repository details if the repository is forked.

columns.name: source
columns.description: Source repository details if the repository is forked.

columns.name: primary_language
columns.description: Primary language used in the repository.

columns.name: languages
columns.description: Languages used in the repository along with their usage statistics.

columns.name: repo_settings
columns.description: Settings of the repository.

columns.name: security_settings
columns.description: Security settings of the repository.

columns.name: repo_urls
columns.description: Repository URLs for different purposes (e.g., clone URLs).

columns.name: metrics
columns.description: Metrics and statistics of the repository.
